title: Group of trimmed Old Judges for sale (7 Hall of Famers)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Group of trimmed Old Judges for sale (7 Hall of Famers)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: MW
This group of 22 N172s includes the following: SOLD

Hall of Famers: Pud Galvin, Ned Hanlon, Jim O'Rourke, Sam Thompson, John Ward (batting), John Ward (sliding), Mickey Welch.

[URL="http://www.bmwcards.com/forsale/1887starsfront.jpg"]Images1 -- Hall of Famers[/URL]

[URL="http://www.bmwcards.com/forsale/1887starsback.jpg"]Images2 -- Hall of Famers[/URL]


Other players: Sam Barkley (Pittsburg), Tom Brown (Pittsburg), Fred Carroll (Pittsburg), Edward Dailey (Philadelphia), Jack Farrell (Washington), Charlie Ferguson (Philadelphia), Ed Greer (Brooklyn), Hardie Henderson (Brooklyn), Bill McClellan (Brooklyn), Jim McCormick (Chicago), Alex McKinnon (Pittsburg), George Myers (Indianapolis), Henry Porter (Brooklyn), Jimmy Ryan (Chicago), Mike Tiernan (New York).

[URL="http://www.bmwcards.com/forsale/1887commons.jpg"]Images3 -- other players[/URL]


The price for the 22 Old Judges is xxxxx, shipping and insurance included.  Checks, money orders and all major credit cards accepted.  All N172s in this group have been trimmed and nearly all have pencil writing and an ink stamp on the reverse side (see images above).  My email address: bmwcrds@aol.com.

posts.post_title: Group of trimmed Old Judges for sale (7 Hall of Famers)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Anonymous
Neat original collection of 1887 OJs.  One Script, one Short Numbered, and the rest split between type A & B '0' Numbered Series cards.  Fairly even distribution of teams with Brooklyn  well represented.  Sorry for the slightly O/T.

Best Regards,
Joe Gonsowski
